verses.ar: الٓرۚ تِلۡكَ ءَايَٰتُ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ وَقُرۡءَانٖ مُّبِينٖ
verses.en: Alif, Lam, Ra. These are the verses of the Book and a clear Qur'an

verses.ar: رُّبَمَا يَوَدُّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ لَوۡ كَانُواْ مُسۡلِمِينَ
verses.en: Perhaps those who disbelieve will wish that they had been Muslims

verses.ar: ذَرۡهُمۡ يَأۡكُلُواْ وَيَتَمَتَّعُواْ وَيُلۡهِهِمُ ٱلۡأَمَلُۖ فَسَوۡفَ يَعۡلَمُونَ
verses.en: Let them eat and enjoy themselves and be diverted by [false] hope, for they are going to know

verses.ar: وَمَآ أَهۡلَكۡنَا مِن قَرۡيَةٍ إِلَّا وَلَهَا كِتَابٞ مَّعۡلُومٞ
verses.en: And We did not destroy any city but that for it was a known decree

verses.ar: مَّا تَسۡبِقُ مِنۡ أُمَّةٍ أَجَلَهَا وَمَا يَسۡتَـٔۡخِرُونَ
verses.en: No nation will precede its term, nor will they remain thereafter

verses.ar: وَقَالُواْ يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِي نُزِّلَ عَلَيۡهِ ٱلذِّكۡرُ إِنَّكَ لَمَجۡنُونٞ
verses.en: And they say, "O you upon whom the message has been sent down, indeed you are mad

verses.ar: لَّوۡمَا تَأۡتِينَا بِٱلۡمَلَـٰٓئِكَةِ إِن كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلصَّـٰدِقِينَ
verses.en: Why do you not bring us the angels, if you should be among the truthful

verses.ar: مَا نُنَزِّلُ ٱلۡمَلَـٰٓئِكَةَ إِلَّا بِٱلۡحَقِّ وَمَا كَانُوٓاْ إِذٗا مُّنظَرِينَ
verses.en: We do not send down the angels except with truth; and the disbelievers would not then be reprieved

verses.ar: إِنَّا نَحۡنُ نَزَّلۡنَا ٱلذِّكۡرَ وَإِنَّا لَهُۥ لَحَٰفِظُونَ
verses.en: Indeed, it is We who sent down the Qur'an and indeed, We will be its guardian

verses.ar: وَلَقَدۡ أَرۡسَلۡنَا مِن قَبۡلِكَ فِي شِيَعِ ٱلۡأَوَّلِينَ
verses.en: And We had certainly sent [messengers] before you, [O Muhammad], among the sects of the former peoples

verses.ar: وَمَا يَأۡتِيهِم مِّن رَّسُولٍ إِلَّا كَانُواْ بِهِۦ يَسۡتَهۡزِءُونَ
verses.en: And no messenger would come to them except that they ridiculed him

verses.ar: كَذَٰلِكَ نَسۡلُكُهُۥ فِي قُلُوبِ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمِينَ
verses.en: Thus do We insert denial into the hearts of the criminals

verses.ar: لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ بِهِۦ وَقَدۡ خَلَتۡ سُنَّةُ ٱلۡأَوَّلِينَ
verses.en: They will not believe in it, while there has already occurred the precedent of the former peoples

verses.ar: وَلَوۡ فَتَحۡنَا عَلَيۡهِم بَابٗا مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ فَظَلُّواْ فِيهِ يَعۡرُجُونَ
verses.en: And [even] if We opened to them a gate from the heaven and they continued therein to ascend

verses.ar: لَقَالُوٓاْ إِنَّمَا سُكِّرَتۡ أَبۡصَٰرُنَا بَلۡ نَحۡنُ قَوۡمٞ مَّسۡحُورُونَ
verses.en: They would say, "Our eyes have only been dazzled. Rather, we are a people affected by magic

verses.ar: وَلَقَدۡ جَعَلۡنَا فِي ٱلسَّمَآءِ بُرُوجٗا وَزَيَّنَّـٰهَا لِلنَّـٰظِرِينَ
verses.en: And We have placed within the heaven great stars and have beautified it for the observers

verses.ar: وَحَفِظۡنَٰهَا مِن كُلِّ شَيۡطَٰنٖ رَّجِيمٍ
verses.en: And We have protected it from every devil expelled [from the mercy of Allah]

verses.ar: إِلَّا مَنِ ٱسۡتَرَقَ ٱلسَّمۡعَ فَأَتۡبَعَهُۥ شِهَابٞ مُّبِينٞ
verses.en: Except one who steals a hearing and is pursued by a clear burning flame

verses.ar: وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ مَدَدۡنَٰهَا وَأَلۡقَيۡنَا فِيهَا رَوَٰسِيَ وَأَنۢبَتۡنَا فِيهَا مِن كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ مَّوۡزُونٖ
verses.en: And the earth - We have spread it and cast therein firmly set mountains and caused to grow therein [something] of every well-balanced thing

verses.ar: وَجَعَلۡنَا لَكُمۡ فِيهَا مَعَٰيِشَ وَمَن لَّسۡتُمۡ لَهُۥ بِرَٰزِقِينَ
verses.en: And We have made for you therein means of living and [for] those for whom you are not providers

verses.ar: وَإِن مِّن شَيۡءٍ إِلَّا عِندَنَا خَزَآئِنُهُۥ وَمَا نُنَزِّلُهُۥٓ إِلَّا بِقَدَرٖ مَّعۡلُومٖ
verses.en: And there is not a thing but that with Us are its depositories, and We do not send it down except according to a known measure

verses.ar: وَأَرۡسَلۡنَا ٱلرِّيَٰحَ لَوَٰقِحَ فَأَنزَلۡنَا مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءٗ فَأَسۡقَيۡنَٰكُمُوهُ وَمَآ أَنتُمۡ لَهُۥ بِخَٰزِنِينَ
verses.en: And We have sent the fertilizing winds and sent down water from the sky and given you drink from it. And you are not its retainers

verses.ar: وَإِنَّا لَنَحۡنُ نُحۡيِۦ وَنُمِيتُ وَنَحۡنُ ٱلۡوَٰرِثُونَ
verses.en: And indeed, it is We who give life and cause death, and We are the Inheritor

verses.ar: وَلَقَدۡ عَلِمۡنَا ٱلۡمُسۡتَقۡدِمِينَ مِنكُمۡ وَلَقَدۡ عَلِمۡنَا ٱلۡمُسۡتَـٔۡخِرِينَ
verses.en: And We have already known the preceding [generations] among you, and We have already known the later [ones to come]

verses.ar: وَإِنَّ رَبَّكَ هُوَ يَحۡشُرُهُمۡۚ إِنَّهُۥ حَكِيمٌ عَلِيمٞ
verses.en: And indeed, your Lord will gather them; indeed, He is Wise and Knowing

verses.ar: وَلَقَدۡ خَلَقۡنَا ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ مِن صَلۡصَٰلٖ مِّنۡ حَمَإٖ مَّسۡنُونٖ
verses.en: And We did certainly create man out of clay from an altered black mud

verses.ar: وَٱلۡجَآنَّ خَلَقۡنَٰهُ مِن قَبۡلُ مِن نَّارِ ٱلسَّمُومِ
verses.en: And the jinn We created before from scorching fire

verses.ar: وَإِذۡ قَالَ رَبُّكَ لِلۡمَلَـٰٓئِكَةِ إِنِّي خَٰلِقُۢ بَشَرٗا مِّن صَلۡصَٰلٖ مِّنۡ حَمَإٖ مَّسۡنُونٖ
verses.en: And [mention, O Muhammad], when your Lord said to the angels, "I will create a human being out of clay from an altered black mud

verses.ar: فَإِذَا سَوَّيۡتُهُۥ وَنَفَخۡتُ فِيهِ مِن رُّوحِي فَقَعُواْ لَهُۥ سَٰجِدِينَ
verses.en: And when I have proportioned him and breathed into him of My [created] soul, then fall down to him in prostration

verses.ar: فَسَجَدَ ٱلۡمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ كُلُّهُمۡ أَجۡمَعُونَ
verses.en: So the angels prostrated - all of them entirely

verses.ar: إِلَّآ إِبۡلِيسَ أَبَىٰٓ أَن يَكُونَ مَعَ ٱلسَّـٰجِدِينَ
verses.en: Except Iblees, he refused to be with those who prostrated

verses.ar: قَالَ يَـٰٓإِبۡلِيسُ مَا لَكَ أَلَّا تَكُونَ مَعَ ٱلسَّـٰجِدِينَ
verses.en: [Allah] said, O Iblees, what is [the matter] with you that you are not with those who prostrate

verses.ar: قَالَ لَمۡ أَكُن لِّأَسۡجُدَ لِبَشَرٍ خَلَقۡتَهُۥ مِن صَلۡصَٰلٖ مِّنۡ حَمَإٖ مَّسۡنُونٖ
verses.en: He said, "Never would I prostrate to a human whom You created out of clay from an altered black mud

verses.ar: قَالَ فَٱخۡرُجۡ مِنۡهَا فَإِنَّكَ رَجِيمٞ
verses.en: [Allah] said, "Then get out of it, for indeed, you are expelled

verses.ar: وَإِنَّ عَلَيۡكَ ٱللَّعۡنَةَ إِلَىٰ يَوۡمِ ٱلدِّينِ
verses.en: And indeed, upon you is the curse until the Day of Recompense

verses.ar: قَالَ رَبِّ فَأَنظِرۡنِيٓ إِلَىٰ يَوۡمِ يُبۡعَثُونَ
verses.en: He said, "My Lord, then reprieve me until the Day they are resurrected

verses.ar: قَالَ فَإِنَّكَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُنظَرِينَ
verses.en: [Allah] said, "So indeed, you are of those reprieved

verses.ar: إِلَىٰ يَوۡمِ ٱلۡوَقۡتِ ٱلۡمَعۡلُومِ
verses.en: Until the Day of the time well-known

verses.ar: قَالَ رَبِّ بِمَآ أَغۡوَيۡتَنِي لَأُزَيِّنَنَّ لَهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَلَأُغۡوِيَنَّهُمۡ أَجۡمَعِينَ
verses.en: [Iblees] said, "My Lord, because You have put me in error, I will surely make [disobedience] attractive to them on earth, and I will mislead them all

verses.ar: إِلَّا عِبَادَكَ مِنۡهُمُ ٱلۡمُخۡلَصِينَ
verses.en: Except, among them, Your chosen servants

verses.ar: قَالَ هَٰذَا صِرَٰطٌ عَلَيَّ مُسۡتَقِيمٌ
verses.en: [Allah] said, "This is a path [of return] to Me [that is] straight

verses.ar: إِنَّ عِبَادِي لَيۡسَ لَكَ عَلَيۡهِمۡ سُلۡطَٰنٌ إِلَّا مَنِ ٱتَّبَعَكَ مِنَ ٱلۡغَاوِينَ
verses.en: Indeed, My servants - no authority will you have over them, except those who follow you of the deviators

verses.ar: وَإِنَّ جَهَنَّمَ لَمَوۡعِدُهُمۡ أَجۡمَعِينَ
verses.en: And indeed, Hell is the promised place for them all

verses.ar: لَهَا سَبۡعَةُ أَبۡوَٰبٖ لِّكُلِّ بَابٖ مِّنۡهُمۡ جُزۡءٞ مَّقۡسُومٌ
verses.en: It has seven gates; for every gate is of them a portion designated

verses.ar: إِنَّ ٱلۡمُتَّقِينَ فِي جَنَّـٰتٖ وَعُيُونٍ
verses.en: Indeed, the righteous will be within gardens and springs

verses.ar: ٱدۡخُلُوهَا بِسَلَٰمٍ ءَامِنِينَ
verses.en: [Having been told], "Enter it in peace, safe [and secure]

verses.ar: وَنَزَعۡنَا مَا فِي صُدُورِهِم مِّنۡ غِلٍّ إِخۡوَٰنًا عَلَىٰ سُرُرٖ مُّتَقَٰبِلِينَ
verses.en: And We will remove whatever is in their breasts of resentment, [so they will be] brothers, on thrones facing each other

verses.ar: لَا يَمَسُّهُمۡ فِيهَا نَصَبٞ وَمَا هُم مِّنۡهَا بِمُخۡرَجِينَ
verses.en: No fatigue will touch them therein, nor from it will they [ever] be removed

verses.ar: ۞نَبِّئۡ عِبَادِيٓ أَنِّيٓ أَنَا ٱلۡغَفُورُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ
verses.en: [O Muhammad], inform My servants that it is I who am the Forgiving, the Merciful

verses.ar: وَأَنَّ عَذَابِي هُوَ ٱلۡعَذَابُ ٱلۡأَلِيمُ
verses.en: And that it is My punishment which is the painful punishment

verses.ar: وَنَبِّئۡهُمۡ عَن ضَيۡفِ إِبۡرَٰهِيمَ
verses.en: And inform them about the guests of Abraham

verses.ar: إِذۡ دَخَلُواْ عَلَيۡهِ فَقَالُواْ سَلَٰمٗا قَالَ إِنَّا مِنكُمۡ وَجِلُونَ
verses.en: When they entered upon him and said, "Peace." [Abraham] said, "Indeed, we are fearful of you

verses.ar: قَالُواْ لَا تَوۡجَلۡ إِنَّا نُبَشِّرُكَ بِغُلَٰمٍ عَلِيمٖ
verses.en: [The angels] said, "Fear not. Indeed, we give you good tidings of a learned boy

verses.ar: قَالَ أَبَشَّرۡتُمُونِي عَلَىٰٓ أَن مَّسَّنِيَ ٱلۡكِبَرُ فَبِمَ تُبَشِّرُونَ
verses.en: He said, "Have you given me good tidings although old age has come upon me? Then of what [wonder] do you inform

verses.ar: قَالُواْ بَشَّرۡنَٰكَ بِٱلۡحَقِّ فَلَا تَكُن مِّنَ ٱلۡقَٰنِطِينَ
verses.en: They said, "We have given you good tidings in truth, so do not be of the despairing

verses.ar: قَالَ وَمَن يَقۡنَطُ مِن رَّحۡمَةِ رَبِّهِۦٓ إِلَّا ٱلضَّآلُّونَ
verses.en: He said, "And who despairs of the mercy of his Lord except for those astray

verses.ar: قَالَ فَمَا خَطۡبُكُمۡ أَيُّهَا ٱلۡمُرۡسَلُونَ
verses.en: [Abraham] said, "Then what is your business [here], O messengers

verses.ar: قَالُوٓاْ إِنَّآ أُرۡسِلۡنَآ إِلَىٰ قَوۡمٖ مُّجۡرِمِينَ
verses.en: They said, "Indeed, we have been sent to a people of criminals

verses.ar: إِلَّآ ءَالَ لُوطٍ إِنَّا لَمُنَجُّوهُمۡ أَجۡمَعِينَ
verses.en: Except the family of Lot; indeed, we will save them all

verses.ar: إِلَّا ٱمۡرَأَتَهُۥ قَدَّرۡنَآ إِنَّهَا لَمِنَ ٱلۡغَٰبِرِينَ
verses.en: Except his wife." Allah decreed that she is of those who remain behind

verses.ar: فَلَمَّا جَآءَ ءَالَ لُوطٍ ٱلۡمُرۡسَلُونَ
verses.en: And when the messengers came to the family of Lot

verses.ar: قَالَ إِنَّكُمۡ قَوۡمٞ مُّنكَرُونَ
verses.en: He said, "Indeed, you are people unknown

verses.ar: قَالُواْ بَلۡ جِئۡنَٰكَ بِمَا كَانُواْ فِيهِ يَمۡتَرُونَ
verses.en: They said, "But we have come to you with that about which they were disputing

verses.ar: وَأَتَيۡنَٰكَ بِٱلۡحَقِّ وَإِنَّا لَصَٰدِقُونَ
verses.en: And we have come to you with truth, and indeed, we are truthful

verses.ar: فَأَسۡرِ بِأَهۡلِكَ بِقِطۡعٖ مِّنَ ٱلَّيۡلِ وَٱتَّبِعۡ أَدۡبَٰرَهُمۡ وَلَا يَلۡتَفِتۡ مِنكُمۡ أَحَدٞ وَٱمۡضُواْ حَيۡثُ تُؤۡمَرُونَ
verses.en: So set out with your family during a portion of the night and follow behind them and let not anyone among you look back and continue on to where you are commanded

verses.ar: وَقَضَيۡنَآ إِلَيۡهِ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلۡأَمۡرَ أَنَّ دَابِرَ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ مَقۡطُوعٞ مُّصۡبِحِينَ
verses.en: And We conveyed to him [the decree] of that matter: that those [sinners] would be eliminated by early morning

verses.ar: وَجَآءَ أَهۡلُ ٱلۡمَدِينَةِ يَسۡتَبۡشِرُونَ
verses.en: And the people of the city came rejoicing

verses.ar: قَالَ إِنَّ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ ضَيۡفِي فَلَا تَفۡضَحُونِ
verses.en: [Lot] said, "Indeed, these are my guests, so do not shame me

verses.ar: وَٱتَّقُواْ ٱللَّهَ وَلَا تُخۡزُونِ
verses.en: And fear Allah and do not disgrace me

verses.ar: قَالُوٓاْ أَوَلَمۡ نَنۡهَكَ عَنِ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ
verses.en: They said, "Have we not forbidden you from [protecting] people

verses.ar: قَالَ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ بَنَاتِيٓ إِن كُنتُمۡ فَٰعِلِينَ
verses.en: [Lot] said, "These are my daughters - if you would be doers [of lawful marriage]

verses.ar: لَعَمۡرُكَ إِنَّهُمۡ لَفِي سَكۡرَتِهِمۡ يَعۡمَهُونَ
verses.en: By your life, [O Muhammad], indeed they were, in their intoxication, wandering blindly

verses.ar: فَأَخَذَتۡهُمُ ٱلصَّيۡحَةُ مُشۡرِقِينَ
verses.en: So the shriek seized them at sunrise

verses.ar: فَجَعَلۡنَا عَٰلِيَهَا سَافِلَهَا وَأَمۡطَرۡنَا عَلَيۡهِمۡ حِجَارَةٗ مِّن سِجِّيلٍ
verses.en: And We made the highest part [of the city] its lowest and rained upon them stones of hard clay

verses.ar: إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَأٓيَٰتٖ لِّلۡمُتَوَسِّمِينَ
verses.en: Indeed in that are signs for those who discern

verses.ar: وَإِنَّهَا لَبِسَبِيلٖ مُّقِيمٍ
verses.en: And indeed, those cities are [situated] on an established road

verses.ar: إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَأٓيَةٗ لِّلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ
verses.en: Indeed in that is a sign for the believers

verses.ar: وَإِن كَانَ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلۡأَيۡكَةِ لَظَٰلِمِينَ
verses.en: And the companions of the thicket were [also] wrongdoers

verses.ar: فَٱنتَقَمۡنَا مِنۡهُمۡ وَإِنَّهُمَا لَبِإِمَامٖ مُّبِينٖ
verses.en: So We took retribution from them, and indeed, both [cities] are on a clear highway

verses.ar: وَلَقَدۡ كَذَّبَ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلۡحِجۡرِ ٱلۡمُرۡسَلِينَ
verses.en: And certainly did the companions of Thamud deny the messengers

verses.ar: وَءَاتَيۡنَٰهُمۡ ءَايَٰتِنَا فَكَانُواْ عَنۡهَا مُعۡرِضِينَ
verses.en: And We gave them Our signs, but from them they were turning away

verses.ar: وَكَانُواْ يَنۡحِتُونَ مِنَ ٱلۡجِبَالِ بُيُوتًا ءَامِنِينَ
verses.en: And they used to carve from the mountains, houses, feeling secure

verses.ar: فَأَخَذَتۡهُمُ ٱلصَّيۡحَةُ مُصۡبِحِينَ
verses.en: But the shriek seized them at early morning

verses.ar: فَمَآ أَغۡنَىٰ عَنۡهُم مَّا كَانُواْ يَكۡسِبُونَ
verses.en: So nothing availed them [from] what they used to earn

verses.ar: وَمَا خَلَقۡنَا ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَآ إِلَّا بِٱلۡحَقِّۗ وَإِنَّ ٱلسَّاعَةَ لَأٓتِيَةٞۖ فَٱصۡفَحِ ٱلصَّفۡحَ ٱلۡجَمِيلَ
verses.en: And We have not created the heavens and earth and that between them except in truth. And indeed, the Hour is coming; so forgive with gracious forgiveness

verses.ar: إِنَّ رَبَّكَ هُوَ ٱلۡخَلَّـٰقُ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ
verses.en: Indeed, your Lord - He is the Knowing Creator

verses.ar: وَلَقَدۡ ءَاتَيۡنَٰكَ سَبۡعٗا مِّنَ ٱلۡمَثَانِي وَٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ ٱلۡعَظِيمَ
verses.en: And We have certainly given you, [O Muhammad], seven of the often repeated [verses] and the great Qur'an

verses.ar: لَا تَمُدَّنَّ عَيۡنَيۡكَ إِلَىٰ مَا مَتَّعۡنَا بِهِۦٓ أَزۡوَٰجٗا مِّنۡهُمۡ وَلَا تَحۡزَنۡ عَلَيۡهِمۡ وَٱخۡفِضۡ جَنَاحَكَ لِلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ
verses.en: Do not extend your eyes toward that by which We have given enjoyment to [certain] categories of the disbelievers, and do not grieve over them. And lower your wing to the believers

verses.ar: وَقُلۡ إِنِّيٓ أَنَا ٱلنَّذِيرُ ٱلۡمُبِينُ
verses.en: And say, "Indeed, I am the clear warner

verses.ar: كَمَآ أَنزَلۡنَا عَلَى ٱلۡمُقۡتَسِمِينَ
verses.en: Just as We had revealed [scriptures] to the separators

verses.ar: ٱلَّذِينَ جَعَلُواْ ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ عِضِينَ
verses.en: Who have made the Qur'an into portions

verses.ar: فَوَرَبِّكَ لَنَسۡـَٔلَنَّهُمۡ أَجۡمَعِينَ
verses.en: So by your Lord, We will surely question them all

verses.ar: عَمَّا كَانُواْ يَعۡمَلُونَ
verses.en: About what they used to do

verses.ar: فَٱصۡدَعۡ بِمَا تُؤۡمَرُ وَأَعۡرِضۡ عَنِ ٱلۡمُشۡرِكِينَ
verses.en: Then declare what you are commanded and turn away from the polytheists

verses.ar: إِنَّا كَفَيۡنَٰكَ ٱلۡمُسۡتَهۡزِءِينَ
verses.en: Indeed, We are sufficient for you against the mockers

verses.ar: ٱلَّذِينَ يَجۡعَلُونَ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَٰهًا ءَاخَرَۚ فَسَوۡفَ يَعۡلَمُونَ
verses.en: Who make [equal] with Allah another deity. But they are going to know

verses.ar: وَلَقَدۡ نَعۡلَمُ أَنَّكَ يَضِيقُ صَدۡرُكَ بِمَا يَقُولُونَ
verses.en: And We already know that your breast is constrained by what they say

verses.ar: فَسَبِّحۡ بِحَمۡدِ رَبِّكَ وَكُن مِّنَ ٱلسَّـٰجِدِينَ
verses.en: So exalt [Allah] with praise of your Lord and be of those who prostrate [to Him]

verses.ar: وَٱعۡبُدۡ رَبَّكَ حَتَّىٰ يَأۡتِيَكَ ٱلۡيَقِينُ
verses.en: And worship your Lord until there comes to you the certainty (death)
